In order to prepare an operation room to receive a suspected or infected patient, only what is essential should stay in the room, therefore few items will need to be disinfected, reprocessed or disposed of at the end of the procedure.
32 Disposable materials should be used whenever possible and any equipment touched by many individuals should be covered by plastic – including monitors, anesthesia equipment, ultrasound devices and computers – with terminal disinfection after the end of the procedure. 26, 27
